# mFormatID

**Instance Property**

A four-character code for the format ID such as `kAudioFormatLinearPCM`, `kAudioFormatMPEG4AAC`, and so forth. (See the `AudioFormat.h` header file for declarations.)

## Declaration

```swift
var mFormatID: UInt32
```
title: mFormatID
